attributes.action: Donate the Lomax residence to the people of Norfolk for new years eve.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of Norfolk are outraged at the way in which we are teased sadistically with fine house parties at Lomax mansion only to be ignored at the most important time of year. We have stood by as the Lomax's filled our beautiful countryside with their dirty homes but now it's time they gave something back! Gordon, we beg you to make this house (inc hot tub) “The Peoples’ House” for one night only. Let’s build a better Britain.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
